sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { FaPhoneAlt, FaAmbulance, FaFireExtinguisher, FaHospital, FaUserShield } from "react-icons/fa"; const emergencyContacts = [ { name: "National Emergency Number", number: "112", icon: , description: "All-in-one emergency helpline" }, { name: "Police", number: "100", icon: , description: "For law enforcement emergencies" }, { name: "Ambulance", number: "102", icon: , description: "For medical emergencies" }, { name: "Fire", number: "101", icon: , description: "For fire emergencies" }, { name: "Disaster Management", number: "108", icon: , description: "For disaster response and rescue" } ]; const EmergencyContact = () => { return (

Emergency Contacts

In case of any emergency, please use the numbers below. Stay calm and provide clear information.

{emergencyContacts.map((contact, idx) => (
{contact.icon}
{contact.name}
{contact.number}
{contact.description}
))}

Request Help or Report an Emergency

); }; export default EmergencyContact;
